description.p: 10d8 + 20 energy, 35 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage
15 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is blinded for 1 round. On a successful save, the target isn't blinded

1d8 cold, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. The explosion creates an icy surface of 10 feet that counts as difficult terrain. Each creature walking over it must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature falls prone. On a successful save, the creature doesn't fall

1d8 ion, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage, On a successful save, the target takes half damage. Each droid must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the droid is stunned for 1 round. On a successful save, the droid isn't stunned

1d6 fire, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. Sets ground on fire in a 10 feet radius for 3 turns. Each target standing or walking in this will be inflicted burning for 1 turn

2d6 acid, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes no damage. The explosion creates an acid surface of 10 feet that reduces AC by 2
creates gas cloud, 10 feet radius. Each creature in the gas must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes poisoned
2d8 kinetic, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage
2d8 energy, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage
1d6 lightning but cannot reduce a creature's health to 0. 10 feet radius. The explosion creates an electrifying field that counts as difficult terrain for 3 turns in a 10 feet radius

10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pushed 5 feet away from the centerpoint and is stunned for 1 round. On a successful save, the target takes isn't pushed and isn't stunned
